title: ‘Let’s Not Forget It’s My Debut’: Remco Evenepoel Tempers Expectations for Tour de France ‘Big-4’ Face-off
content:
Landa, Lampaert, Moscon, Hirt among support crew for Evenepoel in Tour de France voyage of discovery.

Read the full article at ‘Let’s Not Forget It’s My Debut’: Remco Evenepoel Tempers Expectations for Tour de France ‘Big-4’ Face-off on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
